Posts.Content: Jun 7, 2013 03:25PM JrzyGirl1227 wrote: Good Afternoon All, I had my lumpectomy last Thursday, will be meeting with my surgeon on Monday to go over the pathology report and have my sutures removed.  Hoping to get some information then on starting rad therapy.  I've been told it's usually a few weeks after the surgery to give the site time to heal.   Reading everyones experiences had been helpful.
Posts.Title: Summer 2013 Rads Wildlyshel sandiesau
